verses.verse: ([A Psalm] of David when he feigned madness before Abimelech, who drove him) (away and he departed.) I will bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> at all <S%H3605><s%> times; <S%H6256><s%> His praise <S%H8416><s%> shall continually <S%H8548><s%> be in my mouth. <S%H6310><s%>
My soul <S%H5315><s%> shall make <S%H1984><s%> its boast <S%H1984><s%> in the Lord; <S%H3068><s%> The humble <S%H6035><s%> shall hear <S%H8085><s%> it and rejoice. <S%H8055><s%>
O magnify <S%H1431><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> with me, And let us exalt <S%H7311><s%> His name <S%H8034><s%> together. <S%H9191><s%>
I sought <S%H1875><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and He answered <S%H6030><s%> me, And delivered <S%H5337><s%> me from all <S%H3605><s%> my fears. <S%H4034><s%>
They looked <S%H5027><s%> to Him and were radiant, <S%H9315><s%> And their faces <S%H6440><s%> shall never <S%H408><s%> be ashamed. <S%H2659><s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> poor <S%H6041><s%> man <S%H6041><s%> cried <S%H7121><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> him, And saved <S%H3467><s%> him out of all <S%H3605><s%> his troubles. <S%H6869><s%>
The angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> encamps <S%H2583><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> those who fear <S%H3372><s%> Him, And rescues <S%H2502><s%> them.
O taste <S%H2938><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> that the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is good; <S%H2896><s%> How blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H1397><s%> who takes <S%H2620><s%> refuge <S%H2620><s%> in Him!
O fear <S%H3372><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> you His saints; <S%H6918><s%> For to those who fear <S%H3372><s%> Him, there <S%H369><s%> is no <S%H369><s%> want. <S%H4270><s%>

The young <S%H3715><s%> lions <S%H3715><s%> do lack <S%H7326><s%> and suffer <S%H7456><s%> hunger; <S%H7456><s%> But they who seek <S%H1875><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall not be in want <S%H2637><s%> of any <S%H3605><s%> good <S%H9185><s%> thing. <S%H9185><s%>
Come, <S%H1980><s%> you children, <S%H1121><s%> listen <S%H8085><s%> to me; I will teach <S%H3925><s%> you the fear <S%H3374><s%> of the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> is the man <S%H376><s%> who desires <S%H2655><s%> life, <S%H9132><s%> And loves <S%H157><s%> [length of] days <S%H3117><s%> that he may see <S%H7200><s%> good <S%H9185><s%>?
Keep <S%H5341><s%> your tongue <S%H3956><s%> from evil, <S%H9563><s%> And your lips <S%H8193><s%> from speaking <S%H1696><s%> deceit. <S%H4820><s%>
Depart <S%H5493><s%> from evil, <S%H9563><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> good; <S%H9185><s%> Seek <S%H1245><s%> peace, <S%H7965><s%> and pursue <S%H7291><s%> it.
The eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> are toward <S%H413><s%> the righteous, <S%H6662><s%> And His ears <S%H241><s%> are [open] to their cry. <S%H7775><s%>
The face <S%H6440><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> is against evildoers, <S%H6213><s%> <S%H7451><s%> To cut <S%H3772><s%> off <S%H3772><s%> the memory <S%H2143><s%> of them from the earth. <S%H776><s%>
[The righteous] cry <S%H6817><s%> and the Lord <S%H3068><s%> hears, <S%H8085><s%> And delivers <S%H5337><s%> them out of all <S%H3605><s%> their troubles. <S%H6869><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is near <S%H7138><s%> to the brokenhearted, <S%H7665><s%> <S%H3820><s%> And saves <S%H3467><s%> those who <S%H1793><s%> are crushed <S%H1793><s%> in spirit. <S%H7307><s%>
Many <S%H7227><s%> are the afflictions <S%H9567><s%> of the righteous; <S%H6662><s%> But the Lord <S%H3068><s%> delivers <S%H5337><s%> him out of them all. <S%H3605><s%>
He keeps <S%H8104><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> his bones; <S%H6106><s%> Not one <S%H259><s%> of them is broken. <S%H7665><s%>
Evil <S%H9567><s%> shall slay <S%H4191><s%> the wicked; <S%H7563><s%> And those who hate <S%H8130><s%> the righteous <S%H6662><s%> will be condemned. <S%H816><s%>

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> redeems <S%H6299><s%> the soul <S%H5315><s%> of His servants; <S%H5650><s%> And none <S%H3808><s%> <S%H3605><s%> of those who take <S%H2620><s%> refuge <S%H2620><s%> in Him will be condemned. <S%H816><s%>
